"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556375486368723cc9cd3200#post_556375486368723cc9cd3200
Any games really! I can capture any game system pretty much.
My capture card has composite, s-video, component, rgb and hdmi with 1080*60 support so it shouldn't be any problem. Plus I have a good enough PC to run pretty much any game there as well. All I need now is a good connection. :F

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556374c66368722a0dc60d00#post_556374c66368722a0dc60d00
The Wii specs are wrong. The clock speed is right, but the RAM is NOT 512mb.
It's RAM is only at 88mb. The internal flash memory however is 512mb.
